lore: Sigmund deployed his last remaining ships to bomb the outskirts of the city, not caring about endangering the lives of his own people. When the Valkyries took flight to face the fearsome threat, arrows and spells quickly rained down on them. Many Valkyrie Knights died before getting through the walls, and most did not make it to the ships. They protected their sisters, who quickly reached the engines thanks to their sacrifice, causing the ships to fall from the sky.
menagerieDialog: (She spends most of her free time relaxing. Is she really a Valkyrie?)
She's waving her weapon around and striking various battle poses. She must be eager to fight.
(It's completely absorbed in sharpening its weapon and polishing its armor.)
(She is extremely protective of your other creatures. If only your entire team had such camaraderie...)
(She's parading back and forth around the menagerie. You really wish she'd stand still for a moment.)
name: Valkyrie Knight
